sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.PROD_OFFER_ID prodOfferId,A.OFFER_TYPE offerType,A.PROD_OFFER_NAME prodOfferName,A.INNER_OFFER_NAME innerOfferName, A.STATUS_DATE statusDate,A.PROD_OFFER_PUBLISHER prodOfferPublisher,A.STATUS_CD statusCd,A.EFF_DATE effDate,A.EXP_DATE expDate, A.OFFER_NBR offerNbr,A.OFFER_PROVIDER_ID offerProviderId,A.BRAND_ID brandId,A.SERV_BRAND_ID servBrandId,A.TEMPLET_ID templetId, A.DEFAULT_TIME_PERIOD defaultTimePeriod,A.PROD_OFFER_DESC prodOfferDesc,A.EXT_PROD_OFFER_ID extProdOfferId,A.EXP_PROC_METHOD expProcMethod, A.VALUE_ADDED_FLAG valueAddedFlag,A.MANAGE_GRADE manageGrade,A.PROD_OFFER_INITIALAMOUNT prodOfferInitialamount,A.EXPIRE_HANDLE_CONDITION expireHandleCondition, A.COMMON_REGION_ID commonRegionId,A.MANAGE_GRADE2 manageGrade2,A.CREATE_DT createDt,A.SIMPLE_SPELL simpleSpell,A.VERSION version, A.INNER_OFFER_NBR innerOfferNbr,A.PROD_OFFER_TRAIT prodOfferTrait,A.COOPERATION_TYPE cooperationType,A.LOGO_FILE_ID logoFileId FROM PROD_OFFER A
PROD_OFFER_ID=#prodOfferId#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE PROD_OFFER
OFFER_TYPE=#offerType# PROD_OFFER_NAME=#prodOfferName# INNER_OFFER_NAME=#innerOfferName# STATUS_DATE=#statusDate# PROD_OFFER_PUBLISHER=#prodOfferPublisher# STATUS_CD=#statusCd# EFF_DATE=#effDate# EXP_DATE=#expDate# OFFER_NBR=#offerNbr# OFFER_PROVIDER_ID=#offerProviderId# BRAND_ID=#brandId# SERV_BRAND_ID=#servBrandId# TEMPLET_ID=#templetId# DEFAULT_TIME_PERIOD=#defaultTimePeriod# PROD_OFFER_DESC=#prodOfferDesc# EXT_PROD_OFFER_ID=#extProdOfferId# EXP_PROC_METHOD=#expProcMethod# VALUE_ADDED_FLAG=#valueAddedFlag# MANAGE_GRADE=#manageGrade# PROD_OFFER_INITIALAMOUNT=#prodOfferInitialamount# EXPIRE_HANDLE_CONDITION=#expireHandleCondition# COMMON_REGION_ID=#commonRegionId# MANAGE_GRADE2=#manageGrade2# CREATE_DT=#createDt# SIMPLE_SPELL=#simpleSpell# VERSION=#version# INNER_OFFER_NBR=#innerOfferNbr# PROD_OFFER_TRAIT=#prodOfferTrait# COOPERATION_TYPE=#cooperationType#
PROD_OFFER_ID=#prodOfferId#
